structure.unit: JUVENILE PROCEEDINGS -- COMMITMENT AND CARE OF CHILDREN

law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 198, effective July 1, 1987. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 13, effective June 19, 1976. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 52, effective June 21, 1974. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 277, sec. 4, effective June 18, 1970. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 203, effective June 19, 1966. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 44, effective February 27, 1956. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 9, effective June 17, 1954. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 161, sec. 46, effective January 1, 1953.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Disposition of mentally ill or retarded child committed to cabinet.
metadata.note: This section was repealed by 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 280, which was to have become effective July 1, 1982. Thereafter, 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 284 changed the effective date of that act to July 15, 1984. Then, 1984 Ky. Acts. ch. 184 repealed both 1980 Ky. Acts. ch. 280, and 1982 Ky. Acts. ch. 284.
